response.job_title: M.Sc. Project Management for Environmental and Energy Engineering | Electrical Engineer
response.summary: Enthusiastic engineer with a M.Sc. in Sustainable Energy Management and Engineering. I have a relevant working experience in the analysis of the energy sector at national level. Thanks to a diverse working and educational experiences within international environments, I have strong communication skills and team spirit; therefore, I am used to working effectively in a multicultural atmosphere. My career interests lie in emerging trends in energy such as distributed energy sources, energy efficiency, renewable energy, energy management and demand response. Currently looking for a position in the field of power system analysis or renewable energy projects, particularly Solar PV.
response.skills: Electrical Engineering, Power Transmission, Gestión de proyectos, Power Systems, Renewable Energy, Energy Efficiency, Energy Management, Sustainability, Technical Documentation, Microsoft Office, Microsoft Word, Microsoft PowerPoint, Microsoft Excel, Microsoft Project, Management, Problem Solving, Team Leadership, Teamwork, English, Siemens PSSE

company.name: UPME Unidad de Planeación Minero Energética

profile_positions.company: UPME Unidad de Planeación Minero Energética
profile_positions.title: Engineer, Energy Division - Transmission Group

profile_positions.description:
Master thesis performed in the integration of new electrical facilities into the western zone of the French national transmission system. 

• Improved a digital platform for the exchange of information during the insertion process of electrical facilities into the French national transmission system, including the preparation and monitoring of test reports for the first power up of the equipment 
• Designed and implemented a new computer tool to determine the typology of the different facilities that can be integrated into the transmission system, as well as the list of documents required in each of the phases of the process 
• Proposed and implemented a list of KPI to quantify the overall performance of the insertion process of electrical facilities, in order to identify the most critical stages of the same one
profile_positions.title: Trainee, Operating Strategies Service

profile_positions.description:
• Supervised the assembly and commissioning tests of the electrical equipment of a rotary kiln for the production of 1100 tons/day of clinker (project Horno 4) 
• Drafted operating and maintenance manuals of the electrical equipment for project Horno 4 
• Created a list of spare parts of the electrical equipment for project Horno 4 
• Coordinated, managed and monitored adaptation works and maintenance (motors, MCC, VFDs, electric panels) in the areas of pre-blending, blending and clinker production in a cement plant
profile_positions.title: Electrical Maintenance Coordinator

profile_positions.description:
• Structured and analyzed alternatives for mitigating the risk of neglect of the electricity demand of the Eastern area of the National Transmission System (STN) in Colombia 
• Created a detailed database and a map of the location of major industrial electricity consumers and co-generators in the center of Colombia 
• Analyzed power flow in electricity transmission grids 
• Conducted a preliminary feasibility study for constructing a thermal power plant in the Eastern area of the STN in Colombia
profile_positions.title: Engineer, Energy Division - Transmission Group

profile_positions.description:
• Characterized and described transformers for power boards in energy measurement devices to evaluate quality indicators 
• Designed and supported laboratory tests of energy measurement devices and change over switches
profile_positions.title: Electrical Engineering Intern
